Emil est un centre de formation très efficace, les professeurs sont disponibles très rapidement, via des outils comme slack ou mail, les cours sont disponibles en continu, l'application Emil, permet de consulter des cours écrits, des présentations, des vidéos, beaucoup de ressources + les enregistrements des sessions en direct qu'on suit sur Google meet en cours du soir. Les professeurs sont extrêmement compétentes et savent répondre à toutes les problématiques liées aux cours, et ils prennent le temps de bien expliquer et de vous aider lors des TP. Des Quiz permettent également de vous évaluer. A la fin, vous passez un examen en direct avec tout le monde pour obtenir la certification, les professeurs vous remontent le critiques pertinente. Que du bonheur :)
Sincèrement la méthode Emil est parfaite; Je recommande plus que fortement ce centre de formation qui m'a apporter les connaissances nécessaires en Machine Learning dont j'avais besoin pour mes travaux. Et pourtant je partais de 0. Je ne vais pas hésiter a continuer à si d'autres cours sont disponibles et correspondent a mes attentes. J'en viens même a regretter que cela soit déjà fini :) Les élèves sont homogènes et cela apporte une richesse supplémentaires a l'acquisition de nouvelles connaissances. J'en garderais un excellent souvenir
Merci Thomas, Paul et tous les autres Senseï :)

Une formation très intense, mais qui donne de bonnes bases en data analyse pour ensuite creuser plus loin de son côté en autonomie. Il y a également un bon réseau des anciens via le Slack de la formation, et les professeurs se rendent disponibles pour répondre à des questions même à l'issue de la formation. Attention à prévoir assez de temps pour travailler en dehors des horaires prévus pour les cours, notamment pour le projet final.

Le meilleur moyen de mettre un 1er pied dans la data! La formation est adaptée a tous les profils et permet en quelques semaines de sortir avec des bases très intéressantes. La qualité des intervenants est évidemment un gros plus qui apporte une approche très concrète des concepts/langages autour de la data (SQL, python...etc). Le format est lui aussi très adapté pour des personnes en poste. Je me rend compte quotidiennement de la plus-value apportée par la formation Emil. Un big-up à Thomas et Paul pour la qualité de la formation et leur grande dispo tout au long du parcours.

Excellente formation sur un format adapté. Que l'on soit déjà mature ou totalement novice dans la data, la formation Data For Pro amène quelque chose. La qualité des formateurs (qui sont tous des pro de la data) et le rythme d'apprentissage sont idéaux. Le contenu de la formation démystifie le sujet et permet de l'aborder sans appréhension.

Une formation qui a totalement répondu à mes attentes ! On y apprend énormément de choses en peu de temps, tout ça grâce à des cours bien fait et des applications très concrètes. Le projet final permet même d'utiliser ce que l'on a appris dans notre propre entreprise, ce qui donne encore plus de sens à la formation pour des résultats qui impactent directement notre quotidien.

La formation est un condensé de thématiques concrètes autour de la data, avec des applications utiles au quotidien. C'est simple : j'utilise les apprentissages de la formation (automatisation avec G Sheets et Google Data Studio, requêtes avec SQL et petit programme avec Python) pour mon travail et mes clients, j'en suis ravi et ils le sont également !
Le bénéfice est réel pour qui veux en apprendre plus sur la data et la manipuler de manière rapide, ludique et précise.
Paul et Thomas sont très accessibles et apportent leur expertise et leurs expériences pour rendre les cours vivants. Un grand bravo à eux !

Formation complète sur la data et adaptée aux différents niveaux. Avec la possibilité d'apprendre à son rythme grâce à des professeurs compétents et disponibles.
Concrètement j'ai pu mettre à profit les cours sur Google Sheets et Data Studio quotidiennement dans mon travail quotidien.

Une formation pratique, très concrète et actionnable au quotidien. Paul et Thomas sont de super pédagogues, et la possibilité de pouvoir utiliser des vraies données d'entreprises est un vrai plus pour se confronter aux réalités du terrain ! Je rcommande
Excellente formation. Je ne peux que recommander ce bootcamp qui vous donnera les clefs pour la data analyse.

Cette formation apporte une grande clarté dans tout ce qu'il est possible de faire sur ses data en tant qu' Ops, Product, Marketing, Customer Success, ou entrepreneur (quelque soit le métier en fait), quand on est pas un Data Analyst à part entière. 
Avec Emil, on se rend compte qu'on peut déjà faire énormément de choses avec des bases en Sql, Python et quelques outils no code, sans avoir à s'engager dans une formation de plusieurs mois en full time. Certains stagiaires de ma promotion on fait des projets finaux hallucinants en Python par exemple.
La formation équilibre parfaitement théorie et pratique (cet équilibre est très travaillé). Une base solide en GG Sheet, GDS, Sql, Python, requêtes API et web scraping est enseignée et pratiquée à fond, et le contenu nous laisse toutes les pistes pour approfondir. 
On conserve un accès au cours après la formation, et on reste sur le slack d'Emil, où on peut poser toutes les questions qu'on veut !
Le format d'enseignement et le contenu sont archi travaillés et challengés en permanence par les deux fondateurs, c'est vraiment par là qu'il se différencient selon moi. Je recommande !!!

Formation pragmatique et vraiment professionnelle. Une fois terminée, vous avez compris le monde de la data et vous savez les manipuler. A vous les extractions en SQL ou python, la viz avec Google Data Studio, le scrapping de données sur le web et plein d'autres choses très utiles...

La Data ça vous parle mais vous ne savez pas comment devenir pratiquant ?
La formation Emil est un format court qui permet de mettre le pied à l'étrier avec l'appui de professionnels et sur des technologies de pointe.
Une formation au top !

Formation qui m'a été conseillée et que je conseille à mon tour ! Que l'on souhaite découvrir la data ou l'appronfondir, je recommande. Un bon mix entre pédagogie et pratique qui permet une application en entreprise rapide.

Emil est une formation en ligne de très grande qualité. Par son organisation interactive, on apprend très vite, beaucoup de notions, sans s'ennuyer. C'est une formation dense et plus qu'utile dans le domaine de la data. Je vous la recommande grandement si vous souhaitez changer de métier ou être plus au autonome sur des missions data.
Bootcamp incroyable ! J'ai trouvé mon premier CDI en product grâce à ça :) les profs sont géniaux. Super expérience ! Merci encore

Excellente formation, très concrète, avec des vraies data d'entreprises !
Les exos en petit groupe sont un gros plus pour progresser ensemble.
J'ai largement pu progresser en notamment sur SQL et Google Data Studio.
Tout est dans le titre :)

Formation très complète
Formateurs compétents et intéressants

Une formation vraiment complète et axée pratique pour acquérir de nouvelles skills et intégrer la data à son quotidien / son offre / ses process / ce que vous voulez ! Paul et Thomas sont hyper pédagogues et calés sur leurs sujets, trust them ;)

Formation au top !
Les fondateurs ont créé un programme pragmatique qui vous donnera tous les éléments pour pratiquer facilement la data dans votre quotidien. 
J’ai adoré les exercices auxquels on a accès même après la fin de la formation, ce qui permet de se remettre à pratiquer facilement quand on le souhaite.
Formation très utile en tant que Product Manager avec 10 ans d’expérience dans le digital.
Une formation indispensable pour appréhender l'écosystème data, et développer des compétences utiles et rapidement applicables en data analytics. Je recommande fortement !
Emil est une formation très concrète, très activable au quotidien. On a toujours besoin de manipuler de la data. Emil démystifie les skills dont on a besoin pour le faire.
Super formation pour Paris une équipe aux petits soins pour nous apprendre le maximum de compétences ! Un très grand réseau également. Le wagon est une excellente formation !
Super formation, on voit beaucoup de choses très concrètes et qu'on peut directement mettre en application c'est top !

J'ai commencé Emil avec des objectifs personnels ambitieux en data analyse et je peux dire qu'ils ont été atteints et même dépassés. Paul et Thomas sont de super profs, très pédagogues, et tout le contenu du programme est extrêmement actionnable & concret !
Formation complète et adaptée aux différents niveaux. Possibilité d'apprendre à son rythme grâce à des professeurs disponibles avant, pendant et après les cours.

Pas de blabla dans cette formation très pratique et orientée sur le quotidien de l'entreprise. On est sur du concret, avec des formateurs très attentifs à la bonne intégration et compréhension des candidats. Le fait de travailler sur de vrais cas et de vrais données est un vrai plus en terme d'expérience d'apprentissage

En tant que responsable des opérations, j’avais quelques rudiments en data analyse mais j’étais à la recherche d’une formation courte qui me permette d’être plus autonome et d’approfondir certaines connaissances, notamment en SQL. Objectif rempli avec Emil !

Formation complète et enrichissante!
J'ai beaucoup aimé le format de la formation entre cours en vidéo à regarder/étudier avant et session d'exercices en classe. Le fait d'être tous à distance n'est pas du tout gênant grâce à l'utilisation des petites classes.
Paul et Thomas sont toujours à l'écoute pour des questions ou des améliorations.

Très bonne formation, les fondateurs sont excellents que ce soit dans leurs connaissances de leurs sujets que dans leur relationnel. Le contenu est riche, dense et en même temps accessible.
Le fait de pouvoir exploiter des vraies données d'entreprise tout au long de la formation est un vrai plus!
Super formation en Data Analyse ! Si vous cherchez à être autonome sur de la Data Analyse en utilisant les outils les plus fréquemment utilisés dans l'industrie, c'est la formation qu'il vous faut.

Super formation, profs accessibles, contenu pédagogique activable tout de suite. Je la recommande si :

Dirigeant d'un start-up, j'avais besoin d'acquérir rapidement une compétence en analyse de données afin de mieux piloter nos activités. A la fin de cette formation dispensée par deux pointures que sont Paul et Thomas, j'ai pu façonner en toute autonomie mon tableau de bord avec les KPI et metrics sur mon métier et même déployer des dashboards pour mes équipes opérationnelles et mes investisseurs. 
Une très belle et enrichissante expérience. Bravo à Emil. Vous l'avez compris, je recommande vivement !

Ich mache jetzt den Teilzeit Kurs in Business Intelligence mit Schwerpunkt SQL und PowerBI. Ich kann sehr gut mit neuen Lehrwerken selber umgehen. Allerdings, jederzeit wenn ich Hilfe brauche, sind die Mentors im Slack immer da mit viel Geduld, um jede Unklarheit nachvollziehbar zu klären.

Der Aufbau der Lernplattform ist sehr ansprechend und übersichtlich. Der Lerninhalt ist sehr strukturiert aufgebaut. Der Mix aus Videos und Text hat zum Lernerfolg erheblich beigetragen. Die Übungen mittendrin und das Quiz am Enden jeder Lektion sind sehr hilfreich.
Ich kann StackFuel uneingeschränkt empfehlen und habe auch schon sehr viele Kurse in diesem Unternehmen absolviert.

Mir hat das Training zum Data Analysten sehr viel Spaß gemacht. Die Lerninhalte wurden sehr verständlich und abwechslungsreich vermittelt. Auf Fragen wurde sehr schnell reagiert. Ich kann es nur weiterempfehlen.
Echt TOP - spannendes interaktives Training. Das beste, was ich in letzter Zeit erleben durfte. Sehr zu empfehlen.
Sehr interaktive Lernplattform und gut aufbereitete, hoch relevante Inhalte. Die Schulung hat mir sehr gut gefallen!
sehr strukturierter Kurs, wodurch ich gut in das Thema eingeführt wurde.
einfach, gut strukturiert, fexible

Meine Erfahrung mit StackFuel GmbH war von Anfang bis Ende äußerst positiv. Das Unternehmen bietet eine moderne und sehr praxisorientierte Ausbildung, die auf die Bedürfnisse von Fachkräften im Bereich Data Analyst und Business Intelligence (BI) Specialist zugeschnitten ist. Besonders beeindruckt hat mich der hohe Anspruch an die Qualität der Lehrinhalte, die sowohl theoretische als auch praktische Elemente beinhalten, und die sehr benutzerfreundliche Lernplattform, die den Zugang zu Materialien und Übungen jederzeit ermöglicht.
Die Betreuung durch die Dozenten und das Support-Team war stets professionell, schnell und hilfsbereit. Fragen wurden zeitnah beantwortet, und es gab immer Unterstützung, wenn man sie brauchte. Die Kombination aus praxisnahen Beispielen und individuellem Coaching hat dazu beigetragen, dass ich mein Wissen effektiv vertiefen konnte.
Was mich besonders überzeugt hat, ist die klare Ausrichtung auf die Bedürfnisse der Arbeitswelt. Der Fokus auf den Erwerb von realen, anwendbaren Fähigkeiten ist in meinen Augen ein unschätzbarer Vorteil für den eigenen beruflichen Werdegang. StackFuel GmbH hat sich wirklich darauf konzentriert, die Brücke zwischen Theorie und Praxis zu schlagen.
Ich kann StackFuel GmbH jedem empfehlen, der in den Bereichen Data Science oder Business Analytics tiefere Kenntnisse erlangen möchte. Die hohe Qualität der Lerninhalte, gepaart mit einem exzellenten Kundenservice und einer klaren Fokussierung auf praxisnahe Ausbildung, hebt StackFuel deutlich von anderen Anbietern ab.
Fazit: Eine großartige Wahl für alle, die ihre Karriere mit einer fundierten, praxisorientierten Weiterbildung auf das nächste Level heben möchten!

1. Hauptanteil der Weiterbildung besteht leider Gottes aus (interaktiven) Texten, also ähnlich wie „lernen mit Büchern“. Dabei wird jeder Schritt einzeln abgefragt („Tue dies, jetzt tue das“) Selbständigkeit wird dadurch nicht gefördert. Texte beinhalten neben unzähligen Grammatik- und Rechtschreibfehlern (könnte man in meinen Augen noch drüber hinwegsehen) leider auch inhaltliche Fehler, was leider auch in mind. einem Quiz vorkam. In meinen Augen ist das bei einer professionellen Weiterbildung, die in meinem Fall einen fünfstelligen Betrag kostete, ein absolutes No Go!
2. Die sogenannten „Lösungsvideos“, die auch existierten, aber erst freigeschaltet wurden, wenn sich erfolgreich durch die Texte gequält wurde, lasen lediglich die Lösung – also den Code, der benutzt wurde – vor. Eine Erklärung warum jener Weg gegangen wurde, fehlte leider gänzlich. Für jede Person mit tüchtig funktionierenden Augen war das unterirdisch und sinnfrei. (Kurzes fiktives Beispiel: a^2+b^2=c^2 würde im Video folgendermaßen „erklärt“ werden: „Und das Quadrat von a addieren wir zu dem Quadrat von b und erhalten c-Quadrat.“ Nein, doch, oh!) Zudem war der Ton häufig soo leise, dass ich meine Kopfhörer nicht immer nutzen konnte.
3. Das Arbeitspensum (zumindest im Data Scientist-Kurs) war trotz eines erheblichen Vorwissens out of space. Das schnelle und stupide Abarbeiten der Aufgaben wurde dadurch weiter begünstigt und die Selbständigkeit, Dinge wirklich eigenständig zu durchdringen, leider weiter gehemmt. Wie frustrierend der Kurs für Teilnehmer ohne Vorkenntnisse im Bereich von Machine und Deep Learning gewesen sein muss, kann man hier nur erahnen.
4. Die eigene Broschüren der verschiedenen Kurse legt die „Selbständigkeit“ der Teilnehmer in den Fokus, verkauft das Unternehmen als „strategischen Lernpartner“ und die Lernumgebung als „aktuelle Technologie auf neuestem Stand“.
Unterstützung der Selbständigkeit – nicht gegeben, im Gegenteil sie wurde, wie oben an verschiedenen Stellen beschrieben, häufig genug gehemmt.
Strategischer Lernpartner, welcher bei gestellten Fragen mit drei immer wiederkehrenden Antworten reagiert: „Hast du schon gegoogelt“, „Hast du schon ChatGPT gefragt“ und „Das weiß ich nicht, ich werde einen Kollegen fragen und komme wieder auf dich zu“ (Person kam nicht wieder auf mich zu. Auch nicht, als ich die gleiche Frage eine Woche später erneut stellte und mir erneut die gleiche Antwort gegeben wurde xd) – Daher ist in meinen Augen die Aussage, StackFuel sei ein strategischer Lernpartner safe auch nicht gegeben.
Aktuelle Technologie – Vorweg: Es werden nicht die aktuellsten Versionen der Machine Learning Bibliotheken, wie zum Beispiel sklearn, benutzt. Ich hätte Verständnis, wenn statt der aktuellsten Version, zumindest eine Version benutzt wird, in der wichtige Erneuerungen berücksichtigt sind. Die benutzte Version von scikitlearn war 0.23.2 (zum Vergleich Version 1.3.1 war zur damaligen Zeit die aktuelle Version; Es gab also fünf neuere Versionen, als jene, die uns zur Verfügung gestellt wurde). Durch die ältere Version konnten viele Funktionen nicht benutzt werden und work-arounds waren künstlich notwendig, um die entsprechende Lösung zu erhalten. Besonders dann, wenn man mit „aktueller Tech. & neustem Stand wirbt“, empfand ich diese Tatsache als dreist. Mindestens genauso dreist fand ich aber auch die Bereitstellung von lediglich 4 GB Arbeitsspeicher. Data Science lebt von Rechen- und Speicherleistung. Wie man in einem Kurs, indem es um rechenintensive Verfahren geht, nur 4 GB anbieten kann, deckt sich mit meinem Eindruck, dass es bei dem Unternehmen hauptsächlich um Gewinnmaximierung geht, koste es, was es wolle.
5. Die wesentliche Mehrheit der Mentoren war leider selbst Quereinsteiger und konnte einem hin und wieder echt nur leidtun. Je nach Hintergrundwissen unterschieden sich die Mentoren extrem in ihren Antworten, in der Führung und im Aufbau des Kurses und in ihrem Engagement. Leider wurde mein Wunsch, wenigstens einmal in der Woche (gern auch in der Gruppe) aktiv (live coding) gezeigt zu bekommen, wie best practise im jeweiligen Kapitel auszusehen hat, ohne Nennung von Gründen abgelehnt.
6. Jeden Freitag hat die Nachmittagsbetreuung im DS-Kurs ohne Nennung von Gründen nicht stattgefunden – und das bei so einem Preis, nein Spaß, wir wollten nicht mehr über den Preis sprechen… xd
Zusammenfassend: Ganz schlimme Erfahrung im Bereich des E-Learnings. Großer Verdacht, dass auf Grund von AZAV-Zertifizierung eine Art Goldgrube gefunden wurde - denn wo kein Kläger, da kein Richter...

Ich weiß gar nicht wie ich anfangen soll. 
Ich bin leider sehr vom Aufbau enttäuscht. Es wird zwar  alles an Beispielen verdeutlicht, aber die gesamten Zusammenhänge fehlen. Es wird alles in Schriftform erläutert. Die wenigen Videos sind absolut oberflächlich und eigentlich nichtssagend. Ich kann zwar gern das Forum kontaktieren, aber das hat genau so einen geringen Lernfaktor wie der Kurs selbst. Ich kann einmal an einem Workshop teilnehmen, der an einem Tag in der Woche ist und nur zu einer Uhrzeit. Ihr könnt euch vorstellen, dass man nachmittags leider kaum Zeit dafür hat. 
Ich habe bis jetzt kaum die Zusammenhänge verstanden. Es ist gefühlt wild zusammen geschmissen und trocken erklärt. Geht eine weitere Aufgabe von der vorherigen in eine andere Richtung, kann man das "Erlernte" nicht mehr anwenden. Man zahlt einen haufen Geld für den Kurs, dass man letztlich wieder bei Google landet. 
Ich kann meinem Arbeitgeber sagen, dass er viel Geld ausgegeben hat und ich der Weiterbildung leider nichts anfangen kann. Schade drum, ich hätte gerne diverse Daten ausgewertet und damit Abläufe verbessert. Aber mit dem Wissen was ich jetzt erhalten habe, traue ich mich nicht an größere Datensätze. 
Sehr schade ist es zudem, dass man im Endeffekt nichts in der Hand hat. Keine Zusammenfassung mit deutlichen Erklärungen etc. 
Speichert man sich nicht irgendetwas ab, ist es nach dem Kurs verloren. 
Fazit: Nicht zu empfehlen! Ohne eine richtige Schulung (wenigstens per Video) ist der Kurs leider sinnlos.
Sehr gutes Training! Verständlich und abwechslungsreich aufbereitete Inhalte, sehr viele praktische Übungen und sehr guter Support. Ich würde das Training weiter empfehlen.

Ich kann nur Positives über den Kurs und StackFuel als Anbieter sagen.
Der Support und die Organisation seitens StackFuel waren hervorragend. Auf Fragen und Anliegen wurde immer schnell und kompetent reagiert.
Das Training war sehr praxisorientiert, was mir besonders gefallen hat. Man programmiert 99% der Zeit und arbeitet an praxisnahen Aufgaben.
Die Inhalte sind umfassend, gut strukturiert und bieten einen super Überblick über die wesentlichen Machine-Learning-Algorithmen. Und man lernt auch einiges darüber hinaus, da der gesamte Data-Science-Workflow - von der Datenaufbereitung bis zum Storytelling - abgedeckt wird.
Der Kurs ist sicherlich schon anspruchsvoller (je nach Vorerfahrung), wenn man am Ball bleibt aber absolut machbar. Man hat es selbst in der Hand, so wie es sein soll :-)
Die Kurse von Stackfuel sind immer sehr anspruchsvoll.
Hat mir sehr weitergeholfen.

Innovatives  und abwechslungsreiches Lehrgangskonzept als Einstieg in das Thema KI und Big Data. 
Besonders gut haben mir dabei die vorgestellten neuen Berufsbilder im Bereich Data Science und Deep Learning gefallen.

Klasse Platform. klasse Trainer, super Support!!
Jederzeit wieder!
Die Test waren manchmal etwas konfus. 3 Versuche bei 2 Antwortmöglichkeiten sind wenig nachvollziehbar.
Relevante, teilweise komplexe, Themen sehr gut und kurzweilig vermittelt, hoher Wissenszuwachs garantiert.
Sehr gut strukturiert, kurzweilig und informativ.

great  platform to learn
Das Lernmaterial war didaktisch sehr gut aufgebaut, auf Rückfragen bei Problemen wurden immer sehr schnell reagiert.

Sehr gut strukturierte Schulung.
Inhalte wurden konsistent klar, einfach, aufeinander aufbauend vermittelt. Zur Selbstschulung, absolut geeignet. Top!

Data Analyst und Data Science Kursen waren einfach Super! Ich hab wirklich sehr viel mit Stackfuel gelernt. Das Support Team ist auch super nett und hilfsbereit. Dadurch ist es überhaupt nicht trocken und bringt einen sehr schnell sehr tief rein - man hat schnell praktische Lernerfolge. Ich habe die Weiterbildung zum Data Analyst mit dem Schwerpunkt Python gemacht. Ich komme aus einem ganz anderen Bereich - Marketing - so dass für mich vieles komplett neu war. Aber ich glaube, dass in Zeiten von künstlicher Intelligenz jeder Berufszweig eine Datenkompetenz aufbauen sollte. Ich bin sehr froh, dass ich die Weiterbildung bei StackFuel gemacht habe. Das Programm hat mir sehr gut gefallen und mich richtig weiter gebracht. Da für mich vieles Neuland war, war es für mich nicht immer ganz einfach, aber alles war immer sehr gut erklärt und wenn ich mal nicht weiter wusste, hat mir immer jemand aus dem StackFuel Team geholfen. Die Weiterbildung ist für mich bestimmt kein Selbstläufer gewesen und ich habe viel Zeit und Energie reingesteckt, bin jetzt aber sehr, sehr happy mit dem Ergebnis und dem Wissen, dass ich mir aneignen konnte. Ich kann die Weiterbildung jedem empfehlen, der seine Datenkompetenz ausbauen möchte und ein solides Fundament im Bereich Datenanalyse aufbauen möchte.

Das Data Scientist Training hatte sehr viel Tiefe und Detail und was didaktisch sehr gut aufbereitet. 
Die Mentoren antworteten immer schnell auf die im Forum gestellten Fragen. Alles in Allem ein intensives Training, das sein Geld absolut wert war.

Sehr gut aufgebaute Schulung mit klasse Lerninhalten.
Gute Verfübgarkeit und dadurch, dass man autark online geschult wird, maximale Flexibilität.
Das war bei mir extrem hilfreich und notwendig.

Sehr gut strukturierter Kurs Data Analyst - Fokus Python. Interessante Lerninhalte, super strukturiert und verständlich rübergebracht, auch für absolute Anfänger.
Starker praxisnaher Bezug. Animiert und motiviert zum selbstständigen Weiterlernen auch nach Abschluss. 
Macht einfach Lust auf mehr!

Mit Hilfe der Stackfuel GmbH konnte ich einen interessanten Einblack in die Pandas-Software und das Programmieren mit Python bekommen. Die Lehrinhalte waren umfangreich - egal, ob es um Statistik, Regressionen oder Visualisierungen ging - und trotzdem leicht verständlich. Generell hat mir das Lernen während der 8 Wochen mehr Sicherheit gegeben, auch weiterhin in Zukunft mich mit dem Thema Data Analytics auseinander zu setzen.

High level of learning.
The experience was very professional since the beginning, also the support is very good. The content is just as promoted.
Gutes Python-Training, das hier und da noch etwas Luft nach oben hat.

The last project was a great excercise but I did not have all the knowledge during the course to be properly prepared for it. The individal modules covered the topics in general but did not prepare for how to use them on a real life example.

Ich habe mich für den Data Analyst Kurs angemeldet (zwar auf Englisch, wohlgemerkt), da die Kosten von meinem Arbeitgeber übernommen wurden. 
Die Mitarbeiter von Stackfuel, mit denen ich in Kontakt gekommen bin, waren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit - aber das war's auch schon. Folgende Punkte haben mich dazu gebracht diese Bewertung zu schreiben:
1. Es gibt kaum Videoinhalte, und die Lerninhalte bestehen größtenteils aus trockenem Text. Man kann zwar Code-Snippets eintragen und diese werden ausgefürt, aber es findet keine Validierung auf Richtigkeit statt. Und wenn man weiterliest (egal ob man was eingegeben hat oder nicht), wird man so oder so gratuliert ("Congratulations! You've learned xyz"). Das alles wirkt m.m.n. einfach minderwertig und nicht würdig für so einen teuren Kurs.
2. Wenn man nicht an den wöchentlichen Online-Meetings teilnehmen kann, besteht die Option Fragen im Forum zu stellen - und diese werden auch schnell beantwortet. Allerdings sind die Foren so gut wie leer! Es gibt so gut wie keine Fragen von anderen Teilnehmern von denen man profitieren könnte.
3.  Man verliert den Zugriff auf die Inhalte nach Ende des Kurses. Dies war mir zwar von Anfang an klar sodass (anders als bei Punkt 1 und 2) hier keine Enttäuschung entstanden ist. Jedoch sind die Gründe dafür nicht ganz nachvollziehbar für mich, denn man hat dafür ja schließlich bezahlt. Wenn es an den begrenzten Kapazitäten der Cloud-Umgebung liegt, kann man das zB mit einem PDF-Handout und einem lokalen IDE lösen. Klar, man könnte in der Theorie eigenständig Screenshots machen aber das ist nicht der Sinn der Sache.
Ich schreibe so gut wie nie Bewertungen im Internet, aber der Kurs hat mich leider so dermaßen enttäuscht dass ich ich mich schließlich dazu entschieden habe, meine Frust öffentlich zu machen. Bin wenigstens froh dass ich keine ~5000€ aus eigener Tasche gezahlt habe. Es gibt genug Ressourcen im Internet die wesentlich, wesentlich günstiger und hochwertiger sind.

Super effektiver Kursanbieter
Hat Spaß gemacht und habe viele mitnehmen können.

Die Erwartung an ein Online-Training sind voll getroffen worden. Der Support ist da wenn man ihn braucht und die Lerninhalte sind auf die angegebenen Themenschwerpunkte abgestimmt. Ein rundes Erlebnis und dank geringer Verpflichtung innerhalb des Zeitraums auch sehr flexibel nebenbei auszuführen.
Einfache Beschreibung der Themen!
Anspruchsvolle Inhalten mit interessanten Übungen  übermittelt in eigene Tempo

The interactive jupyter notebook environment was very helpful for learning basic principles in python. Working step by step with some examples showed the abilities of this language.
The company supplies with brief description of the tasks and helpful support.
Habe an einem Data Analyst mit Python Kurs teilgenommen und fand die Mischung aus praktischen Übungen, Webinars und theoretischem Input genau richtig

Die gesamte Breite der Data Science in kurzer Zeit methodisch und inhaltlich zu vermitteln, ist nicht einfach - StackFuel hat hier ein Training entwickelt, das diese komplexen Inhalte mit vielen Anwendungsbeispielen und praktischen Sessions näher bringt und dabei alle Ansätze vermittelt, um sich beruflich weiterzuentwickeln.
Great foundation, well spread out, excellent practical questions to put to practise the theory

I had a vacation to go on, during the process of completing this course. I was very worried and stressed because I was unable to give this my full attention in learning it.
Upon coming back from Vacation, I was thinking that I was done for, as I had fallen behind. And sure enough I got an email saying that my enrollment would end soon. I thought I was being kicked out due to being behind 2 chapters.
Not the case at all, I emailed StackFuel support and got an extremely quick response. Reassuring me that I would be able to  continue and complete everything for a whole remaining 10 days!
I was elated, the felxibility of this course took away sooo much pressure!! It was delightful.

Während ich den Data Analyst (DA) Kurs noch weiterempfehlen würde, so würde ich von dem Data Science (DS) Kurs abraten. 
Pro:
-Das Lehrmaterial ist zwar ebenso gut aufgebaut und strukturiert wie beim Data Analyst Kurs allerdings ist der Umfang an „Tools“ die man über den Kurs erhält deutlich umfangreicher. 
Con:
-Zum Ende des Kurses zeigt sich ein Problem auf welches man vielleicht auch nur als Anfänger stößt und das ist der Umfang an Möglichkeiten zum Experimentieren während der Projektphase. Im Laufe des Kurses arbeitet man lediglich Übungen ab, entwickelt aber keine eigenen Konzepte oder erhält Anregungen wie man dabei am besten vorgeht. Als Projekt wird dann erwartet, dass das experimentiert bis es funktioniert, was an sich legitim ist, wenn es dabei ebenfalls Feedback geben würde. Während man mit eigenen Modellen experimentiert, so kann es immer mal wieder vorkommen, dass man einer Merkwürdigen Error-Massage über den Weg läuft oder unvermittelt in einen Time out der Umgebung läuft. An sich wäre das auch kein Problem, wenn es individuelle Projektbesprechungen geben würde oder wirkliche Hilfe durch den Support während der Projektphase. 
Wendet man sich an den Support so erhält man nur den Hinweis, dass Hilfestellungen nicht mehr erlaubt sind [-1]. Was umso absurder ist, da man auch im Verlauf des Kurses immer wieder darauf hingewiesen wird bei Problemen den Support oder das Internet zu nutzen. Ebenfalls unglücklich ist, dass man keine „Auflösung“ des Projektes erhalten würde, wenn man das Projekt nicht zufriedenstellend abliefert. Den Teilnehmenden wird also die Möglichkeit vorenthalten die eigenen Denk-/Konzeptionsfehler nachvollziehen zu können [-1]. Dieser Ansatz ist nicht nur pädagogisch höchst fraglich, sondern auch höchst unseriös. 
Als persönlich Fazit würde ich daher weden den Intensiv-Kurs (DA & DS) noch den DS-Kurs einem Anfänger empfehlen, der diesen Kurs nebenberuflich absolvieren will. Auf Grund fehlender Betreuungsangebote es leider Schade um das Geld.
Wer den Intensiv-Kurs über einen Bildungsgutschein absolviert mag hier besser aufgehoben sein. Allerdings würde ich auch hier Anfänger raten erst den DA-Kurs als Einzelveranstaltung zu absolvieren und sich zunächst an eigenen kleinen DS-Projekten zu versuchen und nicht direkt den Intensiv- oder DS-Kurs zu belegen.
Datensätze dazu gibt es zB bei "Kaggle" und Lehr/Orientierungsmaterial unter "machinelearningmastery". 
Stellt man dann fest, dass man strukturierteres Lehrmaterial braucht, so mag der DS Kurs eine akzeptable Erweiterung sein.

I am so happy about my valuable experience with the online course on 'Data Analytics and Data Science with Python' with StakFuel. After taking other online courses on different famous platforms, I can say that StakFuel was different, especially with its learning material with many real-life related projects in both Data Analytics and Data Science. Additionally, two knowledgeable instructors were always available which made our Data Analytics and Data Science life even much easier! :)

Besser als passive Kurse, die nur Erklär-Videos abspielen. Man kriegt eine gute Betreuung, strukturierte Übungen und muss sich echt ranhalten.
Insgesamt habe ich viel Spaß beim Lernen gehabt und bin super zufrieden. Meine Python-Kenntnisse wurden passend entwickelt (man ist bei numpy nicht zu sehr ins Detail gegangen). Und man kriegt auch Tipps für Bewerbung, weitere Projekte nach dem Kurs, die man dann selbst machen kann, und wird jederzeit gut betreut.

Vor etwa 5 Monaten habe ich mit Stackfuel-Datenanalysekursen begonnen (ohne Programmiererfahrung) und mit Hilfe des sehr strukturierten Trainings von Stackfuel konnte ich meine Ängste überwinden und viel lernen und einen Abschluss machen.
Gutes Training bei einem engagierten Team.

I have just finished a Data Scientist course at StackFuel. It was a 5-month part-time course which covered a lot of contents in the field data scientist/python/machine learning. StackFuel is still a new company and they have good potential.

Habe hier sehr schnell Lernerfolge erzielt, anders als bei Videolektionen.
Super praktische spaßige Lerninhalte und ein Mentor Team das dir jederzeit Hilft die Lerninhalte so gut wie möglich zu verinnerlichen und zu verstehen.

StackFuel bietet echt tolle praxisorientierte Weiterbildungen für Data an. Eignet sich für Neulinge, aber es geht inhaltlich echt tief. Für mich der beste Anbieter am Markt. Vor allem wegen dem offiziellen Zertifikat. Gerne wieder.
Ich war sehr zufrieden, gerne wieder.

The course content is really practical and the structure is great. Good guidance from Mentor and good response from Tutor

Career Foundry is one of the best boots camps, it's hand's on project base learning, very supportive and help full institute, I am still learning and recommend this is one of best boots camp for learning computer science.

I didn't even know UX Design was a thing before joining CareerFoundry, and now 6 months in its about to be my new career and I'm so excited! I do the product management course. The structure of the course is very clear. Every exercise includes the theoretical part and than you have to work on a project. I think it is good to have also the practical approach but I would prefer that every student works on his or her own project and not the every student works on the same project. There is a lot to read and I would prefer personally a little bit more video content or sometimes a live class or a discussion with an expert in between. Over all I think it is a good learning experience and I hope it will help me to get a job soon.

I really appreciate the amount of support that I’m getting from my tutor and my mentor. Having weekly calls with my mentor has been such a guiding light and such a supportive reinforcement when I’m feeling confused or overwhelmed.
I’m having so much fun in my learning process. The course is complete and it exceeded my expectations :)

I'm half way through of my Product Management training course and really enjoy it! Training modules are well structured and through the practical tasks for each module it really makes the learnings stick. 
Each task is swiftly reviewed by a tutor and for the final tasks in each module (there's four) a mentor is giving you helpful feedback. Tasks do require time so one needs to be organized to make this happen.

To be honest, I was a bit skeptical in the beginning. This course isn’t like traditional learning — there are no live classes or daily lectures. Instead, you’re mostly working independently, going through lessons on your own, reading, researching, and completing tasks one by one.
Yes, you do have a mentor and a tutor, and they’re helpful when you need support or feedback. But still, you’re responsible for your daily progress, which can feel both empowering and overwhelming.
Before I enrolled, I read some reviews saying the course is “too easy” or “boring.” Personally, as someone who doesn’t come from an IT or digital background, I wouldn’t call it easy. It’s actually challenging in a good way — it pushes you to think, apply what you learn, and complete real projects.
I got stuck on 2 or 3 tasks and even felt frustrated at times. But I managed to push through, and that gave me more confidence. It’s definitely not impossible to understand, but you have to be self-disciplined and motivated.
Right now, I’m in the middle of the course, so I’m still not 100% sure if it will be worth it in the end. I’m especially curious about the job coaching phase, which starts once you complete 51% of the course.
For context, I’m based in Berlin, and my goal is to find a job in digital marketing. So far, things are going well. The course content is satisfying, and I’ve already started to take on some freelance jobs for people around me — which is a great sign that I’m learning useful skills.
I'm doing the Data Analyst course. Super interesting so far. Everyone is available to help. Got my laptop in days after registering. Lots of communication from all relevant parties.

I've been taking the Product Management course at CareerFoundry for a month now, and so far, it's been a great experience. As someone transitioning into the tech industry, it was important for me to find a course that offered high-quality content, flexibility, and a strong practical approach—and CareerFoundry delivers that.
After researching several academies, I chose CareerFoundry because of its well-rounded structure. I really appreciate the combination of digestible theory with immersive, hands-on learning through assignments, case studies, and real-world tasks. What stands out the most is the human element added to the e-learning experience. Having a tutor to review my work and provide personalized feedback, along with regular check-ins with a mentor, adds an essential layer of accountability that’s often missing in self-paced online learning.
So far, I’m very satisfied with the course, the platform, and the overall experience.

Supportive, flexible, and empowering!
CareerFoundry has been a game-changer in my transition into Product Management. The course structure is clear, the mentorship is incredibly helpful, and the flexibility makes it easy to balance with other commitments. I’ve felt supported every step of the way—and I’m gaining real, practical skills I can use in the field.

I feel like I have learned a lot but I wish there was a way for our mentors to be more involved throughout the lessons instead of just reviewing assignments.  I also haven't went through the career acquiring portion of the course so we'll have to wait and see how that will go.

I’m currently enrolled in the full-time Product Design course at CareerFoundry, and overall, it’s been a positive experience. I specifically chose this program for its flexible, self-paced structure, which lets me learn on my own schedule while staying on track with weekly assignments. The dashboard design breaks the material into small, manageable sections, helping me stay motivated without feeling overwhelmed. The hands-on projects are a great way to apply what you’re learning, and if you put yourself out there, you can build a student community for extra support.
That said, one area where I think CareerFoundry could improve is in offering more personal interaction with tutors. While weekly video calls with mentors are helpful, tutors—who are more directly involved with your assignments—are only reachable via written feedback or chat messages. Having occasional video or phone calls with tutors could really enhance the learning experience and clarify feedback more effectively.
Overall, it’s a well-structured program best suited for motivated, independent learners who appreciate flexibility but would benefit from a bit more real-time interaction.

I recently completed the CareerFoundry Data Analytics Program and found it to be a thorough, well-paced learning experience. The curriculum covers essential tools like SQL, Python, Tableau, and Excel, and the hands-on approach helped me build real-world skills through guided projects and independent analysis.
One of the most valuable aspects was the emphasis on portfolio development. By the end of the program, I had multiple polished case studies that showcased different types of analysis, from consumer behavior insights to predictive modeling. Which I now use to demonstrate my skills to potential employers.
The support from mentors and tutors made a big difference. Their feedback was thoughtful and helped me grow not just technically, but in how I communicate insights effectively. As someone coming from a non-tech background, I appreciated how approachable and practical the program was from day one.

Career Foundry is amazing! They have all the perfect resources to really understand UX Design. Their communication skills that they have built within the platform is super helpful when your stuck and need a quick answer. Being provided with a tutor and a mentor is key to really understand the program and making sure you're on the right path.

The lessons were clearly structured and thoroughly explained, making complex topics easy to understand. Teachers demonstrated a high level of responsiveness, promptly addressing questions and providing support when needed. Additionally, the abundance of detailed resources greatly enhanced the overall learning experience.

CareerFoundry has helped me fast track learning about UI design. The curriculum is structred logically, from basic UI design fundamentals to more specific terms and specialization. They even spend a decemt amount of time teaching you UX, which is an integral part of the UI design process.

CareerFoundry's exceptional instructors provide unmatched support throughout the entire curriculum. The program's flexible learning environment lets students move at their own pace. Hands-on exercises and real-world projects help build essential skills and experience. This method encourages a deep understanding of key concepts and industry best practices. As a result, graduates are well-equipped to thrive in their chosen careers.

I really love the curriculum of my UI course. My tutor and mentor are always supportive and give me valuable tips.

I was part of the Web development program. So far, I have to say that Career Foundry has been above my expectations!! I have had a superb experience while using this learning platform as a stay at home new mom. My mentor and tutor have been of immense help and support in my new learning journey. I would totally recommend

The CareerFoundry (CF) Digital Marketing Immersion course was as intense as the program title suggests!
However, with my helpful tutor (Elena Bazai), mentor (Luca Ziprani), and other staff members in business development (Oliwia Schildt) and Student Support (John, Carly, etc.).
Amongst them all, they possess decades of extensive Digital Marketing industry experience, CF curriculum knowledge, and an understanding of requirements and scope of flexibility from the Agency fur Arbeit (AFA) - my program funder.
Although the program is online and remote, I never felt I was in it alone with such a support network as well as access to the student Slack channel and examples of past student work, and live 1-on-1 mentor sessions with Luca as well as nuanced, detailed assignment feedback from Elena.
I highly recommend CareerFoundry to others - whether those looking for a career change, upskilling, or wanting to send a staff team on a training sabbatical/continued professional development program.

As a data analytics student, careerfoundry has been really supportive in preparing me for a job. My tutor took a while to respond to my questions, but they extended my course by a very generous amount to compensate.

I really appreciated how well-structured the CareerFoundry’s UX course was, and the thoughtful feedback from my mentors! It made a huge difference in my growth and confidence as a UX designer, and I’m currently implementing a lot of knowledge i gained from the course.

I’m happy to have so much good support from my Tutor and Mentor throughout my journey and can’t wait to get to the point where I am given help in beginning my job search. I feel confident in what I’ve learned so far.

I completed the UX Design program at CareerFoundry last year, and looking back now, I can honestly say it was one of the best decisions I’ve made. I’ve already recommended it to so many people.
What made the experience so valuable for me was not just the quality of the course content, but also the incredible support I received from my tutor and mentor. Thanks to their guidance, I felt truly prepared to start working as a UX Designer after graduating — and more importantly, I believed I could be a good one. They helped me build solid knowledge and gain clarity on my career goals and direction.
I am happy with excellent timely review of my assignments and great feedback for the Tutor and my mentor. Also, the learning platform is ease and straight forward to use.

Course information is very clear and interesting, very quick responses from mentor and tutor, and can practically apply a lot of the training immediately in everyday work! Being modular it gives a great sense of achievement to complete the individual tasks and all the information is provided along with resources for further learning. Highly recommended!

This could be a good program, but it seems like there are empty promises and poor planning of curriculum that get in the way.
First off, while I was deliberating which vendor to use, CF was my first choice due to cost and program description.  One of my requirements for online learning was to have the option to listen to the material rather than read it.  I was assured that the module had an audio option.  I began taking the intro courses, which had a screen reader integrated, all good.  But once I was out of the intro course and into the immersion part, this option was no longer present.  So I had to slog through using an extension to my browser for audio, which I thought was deceptive.
My other issue involves the tools required to complete the program.  There were a few tools that were offered as free to use during the course, but along the way there were a lot of tools required that you needed to use on a trial basis and then needed to be paid for to continue. The trial length was short, so I had to sign up with multiple emails to accomplish my assignments. This seems like a deceitful practice.  When you are paying for a course, you should have access to all the tools you need included in the tuition cost. CF should be partnering with these vendors for limited use of the tools 
Finally, many of the links to articles in the lessons were outdated or behind a paywall.  I feel like this was indeed a waste of money.  I got what I needed from the course and then lost interest.  To that point, not one person reached out to me about my lack of engagement. I think if these wrongs were corrected, this could be a much better program
Do not waste your money with this company.
The tutors are always attentive and the material is very professional!
I really enjoy the coursework and appreciate the support from the tutor.

my experience was so bad the company just make me waste my time an money the tutor and mentor you just hear from then just 1 time a week, even it can happen the you just don't heard at all from then avoid this company.

The course was very intuitive and a really deep dive into technical topic. The team of mentors and tutors was always present and ready to assist you during the process.
I will not give five stars only because some of the content was slightly outdated but other than that, awesome experience
Great experience, tutor and mentor super helpful and always responding on time.

So far I had a really great experience. I'm a few month in and from the prep- to the course-stage, the team is really supportive and encouraging. I love the practical approach via projects. The depth of each chapter is a good compromise and they  always give you sources / links to dive deeper if you like to.

The Product Manager course is really well structured and I’ve been enjoying it so far. It can be quite overwhelming while changing careers but I feel guided and having a real mentor to lead me is a great addition!

Went through the Digital Marketing course in 2023 and while the costs were covered by the German government, it was ultimately fully a waste of time. I finished it, but it doesn't provide you with anything better than watching a youtube tutorial in the eyes of a potential employer. The field is highly competitive, and unless you can afford to work afterwords for free for years until you build an impressive enough portfolio, save your time and take a different route.

The job guarantee program is not honored. Check other comments regarding this and you'll see the same comments. They'll do anything and make any excuses so they can cancel it and not refund you. I regret ever spending my money on this program! What a waste of money!

I completed CareerFoundry’s UX program in March 2024, but despite applying to hundreds of positions since then, I have not gotten a single interview. Following the program, I sought feedback from an experienced design professional, only to discover that my portfolio was considered below industry standards—even though it had been approved by CareerFoundry mentors.
I also participated in their 6-month job guarantee program, but unfortunately, I still did not secure any interviews. When I requested a refund, I was informed that I was ineligible due to a lack of “proper documentation” and because I had not met with my mentor every two weeks. This was challenging to accomplish, as my mentor had personal issues that led to canceled calls, and my full-time job made rescheduling difficult. I was also told that I needed to check in with my mentor biweekly, but he would regularly not respond to me, or get back to me days later so what was the point of checking in this often. 
Reflecting on the program, I feel that CareerFoundry’s job guarantee and strict policies seem designed to attract students rather than prepare them for success and realities in the design field. About two-thirds of the way through, I started noticing a lack of detailed instruction on essential design topics like accessibility, spacing, color, and typography. While these topics were mentioned in assignments, they were often too vague to apply effectively. I gained far more insight through my own research and guidance from industry professionals than from the program itself, leaving me feeling misled.
When I requested a phone call to discuss the refund, I was told CareerFoundry didn’t have enough staff for a conversation—a surprising response from a company centered on UX, where user insights should be a priority. 
At this point, I am genuinely disappointed with my experience in this program. To anyone considering CareerFoundry’s UX program, I would advise looking elsewhere.

I'm taking a Data Analytics course at Career Foundry, and it's been a great experience. The curriculum is well-structured, and the instructors are supportive. I appreciate the hands-on approach and the encouraging community.

The supportive community and comprehensive training make this course an outstanding choice for aspiring UX designers.

I’m very disappointed with CareerFoundry. I was misled about program requirements—specifically an additional “Specialization course” that was only mentioned after I enrolled. I expected better support and transparency, but instead, I got vague explanations and shifting requirements. I wouldn’t recommend CareerFoundry based on this experience.

I love being able to have access to my tutor and mentor for any questions. I also made friends through the Slack group and it has made all the difference when we can be there for each other's progress.

This program taught me a lot. It taught me how to work in excel, SQL, Python, charts and graphics and many powerPoints. The only no so great thing is that it’s too much information personally for me and the information of each assignment can be condensed down, but other than that 10/10.

I looked at other courses and have found Career Foundry is best in value and support. I like that they offer mentorship and also tutors who are actively in the UX space to review work and provide real-life advice that will be valuable upon entry into the industry.
The support and feedback that is provided by CareerFoundry was amazing. There's not much interactions with other's in the cohort but the information and courses are well put together.

I am almost finished with my program at Career Foundry, and I couldn't be happier. They actually provide every bit of the support they claim they will and then some! The Slack groups are also awesome and I've met so many people making a career change just like me and had great networking opportunities.

I'm 2 months into my Data Analytics course and I am learning so much. The lessons are well laid out and easy to follow. I especially enjoy getting the chance to discuss the learning objectives, the tools, and the industry with my mentor.

I am currently taking Data Analytics course from Careerfoundry. I am half way through the course and I must say they have really made the course interesting and easy to understand, particularly for someone like me who is coming from a totally different background(international relations) and has no experience in working with large set of data or even a little knowledge of coding. They have beautiful broken down the concepts in simple language, with pictures and videos, which helps me understand the topic really well. They also have a mentor and tutor assigned to you who will help you through this course. We can schedule a video call with mentor and can contact tutor through chat. The project assignments are interesting and I enjoyed making them. I am looking forward to complete this course and start my career as a data analyst.

I'm currently enrolled in CareerFoundry's Data Analytics course, and I must say it's been a fantastic experience so far. The course structure is well-designed, providing a comprehensive learning path that covers all essential aspects of data analytics. What stands out the most are the exercises and assignments—they are incredibly insightful and practical, allowing me to apply what I've learned in real-world scenarios. The feedback from mentors has been invaluable in guiding my progress. I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to dive into data analytics with confidence.

I love the Career Foundry UI Design course. The entire curriculum is very detailed and provide a good amount of resources. Also, I did a front-end development course as part of my specialization. I am happy that I can able to do it. I have learnt so many amazing facts and done awesome projects throughout my journey in CF. I got amazing Mentor and advisor support during the UI Design course. 
Thank you CF😊

Career Foundry is amazing! I learned so much and have had so many wonderful mentors to help me throughout this process. They were also incredibly accommodating when I needed to take some time off for surgery which was a huge help for my peace of mind.

What makes Career Foundry great for learning a new technical skill in Data Analytics in less than a year?  The program structure.  The program is laid out by the technical skills you'll need in the field when you pass the course.  You also are assigned a tutor and mentor.  These are the three blocks in your foundation to becoming a Data Analyst.  When I was researching programs, the fact that this program assigned you real people to help you through a virtual course really made the difference for me.  Both my tutor and mentor are a great support system during my endeavor to learn this new skill.  As with anything, there are challenges; my experience has been positive so far with the entire program - my mentor and tutor and the student support services.  I started the program in February this year and plan to complete the program in January 2025.

The content went in depth and provided real world scenarios and projects to work on to help utilize the knowledge and skills learned throughout the course. The support from your mentor and career specialist was also really great!
CareerFoundry was the best choice I made. It helped me launch a new career path. With the tutor and mentor help they provide, learning something new is not as scary as it may seem!

I really enjoyed my experience with CareerFoundry. My mentors and tutor were so supportive and helpful along the way. The knowledge I learned helped me feel confident moving forward in my new career path.
The mentors and tutors were very supportive!

Every single person I have dealt with at CareerFoundry has been extremely helpful and personable. The course structure itself is very practical and teaches you real life skills. I have been really impressed with my experience!

The material is great and the support is so strong that I always feel I have someone to turn to when I get hung up. The community around the world is fun to be apart of as well. CareerFoundry has allowed me to imagine myself in a new career and provided the steps to get there. I’m grateful and highly recommend!
I like that we get to practice what we've learned in an exercise right away.

So far I am enjoying my UX/UI course with Career Foundry as I evolve in a new career. I am in the second part of the program, and while a bit challenging, its a good challenge that opens up your creativity and offers insight. My mentor and tutor are great! They are both readily available when I have a question or concern, to provide feedback and suggestion. The enrollment process was simple and straightforward. I highly recommend taking the 5 free day course, it was very helpful in decided which program I wanted to take. I will recommend Career Foundry

The course has been of such high quality; the learning tasks are meaningful and really give you the ability to put the concepts into practice.  My tutor is amazing and reads each of my submissions carefully and provides targeted and meaningful feedback in a timely manner.  She sends me the best resources and links to really helpful and thought-provoking articles and resources.  She's always spot-on.  The pace is rigorous, but keeps me on track for reaching my goals.  The student services team is good but can take a little long to get replies and not reachable by phone for customer service issues which can be a little frustrating.  But any issues I've had have been resolved in a very professional and satisfactory manner by the student support team.  I have confidence that Career Foundry is going to lead me towards my next professional goals.

The course set up is wonderful! I love how you are able to see what is expected of you in the course and the how to stay on top of it. I love the positive feedback from exercises submitted and what areas I need to work on to improve.

Careerfoundry has various disciplines that students can choose from. I’m currently enrolled to their product management course. So far, I feel that Careerfoundry has provided me the resources and materials that is needed in helping to understand each tasks that is in each module.  There are lots of assignments, and I feel this is good for learning new things and obtaining new skillsets required and preparing myself for my next job. The student advisor and mentorship within the program is beneficial in helping me and guiding me to the right direction! Best of luck to everyone!
I like the new AI assistant feature and how the courses scripts are managed.
I’m learning so much at careerfoundry. I have very supportive mentor and tutors that give me valuable feedback to keep improving.

My tutor and mentor are amazing! I’m also really enjoying learning about the UX design process. As a graphic designer, I’m hoping to utilize my current skills and merge them with what I’ll learn throughout this course so that I can make a successful career change in the future.
the mentor i have is very helpful, providing me tips that beyond what the basic syallbus is about. Class material is good too.

Supportive instructors
I have found that the CF materials cover a lot of each topic and included additional resources for further reading/learning. Generally, the feedback from my tutor and mentor has been really good, as well. Both are helpful with answering questions and steering me in the right direction as needed.

I am taking the data analytics program, anyway. This is a new area with its challenges, but as I am working through it day by day, it becomes more rewarding and interesting. I hope the experience and learning outcome will be worthwhile after the program.

CareerFoundry is truly a helpful platform to see the whole picture of full-stake web development. I would like to recommend anyone who wants to get a career change or improve their website-developed skill join their course.
Also, they do not only give you the skills but also opportunities to know more about your career path and this industry.
It is one of the most organized and useful courses I recommend.

I’m really impressed by how thorough the entire course is. But not in a way that is intimidating or overwhelming because you have mentors and student advisors with you in every task. I’m also so happy to still have access to the CF slack because resources and leads are constantly being posted. Overall I’m so happy with my experience!

I'm taking the self-paced course, and it has been such a great experience for me. The staff has been so helpful, positive, and supportive, and even the assignments are both informative and supportive as well. The readings remind me to take a break when we've covered a lot of information, and even acknowledge that, if a certain thing isn't making sense yet, that we will go into more detail soon. It's like they can read my mind. 
I'm so happy with my choice with CareerFoundry. I feel motivated to continue my learning, while also not feeling overworked or stressed. I highly recommend it.
The program is very well laid out. I am able to apply direct learnings to my new job as a data analyst. I also think that the instructor and mentor feedback is very valuable.

The process of looking for a Bootcamp was complex given the number of options there. In the end I chose Careerfoundry because of the number of positive reviews I found and because from day 1 they answered all my questions and advised me on this new path.
I am now four months into the UX design program and I couldn't be more satisfied. All the content on the platform is understandable and interesting and the tasks are quite good to train you in real life situations. What surprised me most is the follow-up of the tutors and mentors; they really do everything possible to always give you feedback and help you improve.
I can say that currently I feel 100% more prepared than when I started. I am very excited to see my progress at the end of the course!

Im 1/3rd of the way through my UX course and Im so impressed. Ive loved meeting with my mentor weekly who is guiding through my career change. The lessons are engaging and the homework is fun! I cant believe how much Im learning, I will actually be sad when the program ends!

I'm on a learning journey with CareerFoundry. It's almost 2.5 months into the course, and I've been learning a lot and improving with every step. My tutor is a good source to ask questions daily, and my mentor is there to help me in my journey. I know that the process is so important, so other than focusing on speeding to finish the course, I will engage with each step and grow. Thank you CF team!

So far, I have enjoyed the course structure and learning methods. It is beneficial to have support from my mentor and tutor, who are always available to assist me. Despite working independently, I feel accompanied throughout the course.

So far throughout my Full-stack Web Development course my tutor Sahil Makwane and mentor Shawn Rice have been so helpful and patient with me. I came into this course with zero experience in tech and web development. I am loving it so far! It's really cool to see what you can create with code! I am very excited for the road ahead and to begin my web development career!

Overall CareerFoundry has been a great course. I’m not quite halfway through so I haven’t unlocked the Specialization or Job Prep Course yet. But this is my experience of the course so far: 
The tutors and mentors are extremely helpful and responsive. The material is laid out well and the instructions for tasks are usually easy to follow. Having said that, there are few areas that could use improvement. 
1. I have made a couple of friends on Slack from the course but I do wish it were easier to find people at the same stage/level in the course to study with. I work well in study groups and haven’t been successful in finding people to study with yet.
2. The workshops don’t seem live. I have attended a couple of the workshops and they don’t seem live to me. I could be wrong, but I would love it if all the workshops weren’t just recordings.
3. Having an audio lecture would be super helpful! There is a feature where students can listen to the readings but it’s with a dry, robotic voice and it’s hard to stay engaged. Having an actual lecture would be great. They have a few video recordings throughout the course but it’s usually only for small sections. Having something similar to these but for the entire Exercise would be really helpful to someone like me who is used to a lecture.
All in all, it’s a nice course with extremely positive mentors and tutors.
It's quite good. I have learnt a lot from this course. It's much better than most other courses of UX UI as its much more in-depth and focused.

I am close to finishing the UX Immersion course, and I like the fact that there are multiple mentors and a tutor. I like the structure of an assignment, which you can do at any time. Overall, I will give it four out of five since sometimes it takes a long time for your mentor or tutor,r to respond, but that's ok; the one thing that bothered me the most is that as someone who is doing a complete career change, there is not really "how to" use new tools like Figma or Slack, it's kind of..figure it out yourself. Yes, there is a seminar on how to use it, but it is in Germany, and I live in the u.s and can't be online at that time. 
Again, overall, the staff is very supportive, and they send you a lot of informative information!

I appreciate how this course is self-paced and you get access and engage with real humans (tutor, mentor, student advisors, slack community). When I submit my tasks for review and approval, my tutor is prompt and thoughtful in providing supplementary articles as well! When I have 1:1 mentor calls, she provides me a safe space to review what concepts are challenging me, tangible action items, and guidance on how to succeed in accomplishing each module.

I've been in the career foundry program for about 5 weeks.  So far my experience has been absolutely fantastic.  I am doing the program full time and the course allows for you to move at your own pace which I love.  Im really enjoying learning online, more than I thought I would! In addition, my tutor and mentor are absolutely fantastic! What Im most amazed by is how much I have learned in a short period of time.  Im looking forward to beginning my career in UX!

I really enjoy the layout and the ease of being able to track my own progress. Each lesson is very well explained and goes into detail making the concepts very easy to understand. The tasks are engaging as it is easy to see how it is preparation for the real job world.

This course is building my knowledge base in a short period of time.  My tutor is timely and encouraging through all of my task submissions while my mentor coaches and challenges me to continue my growth with regular meetings in a supported space.  It's amazing how much I have learned so far.  I'm excited to keep going!

I feel like I'm really getting a thorough education in my field of choice. My tutor and mentor are both amazing and they offer so much supplementary materials and videos to further my knowledge of the various lessons. The experience has been amazing so far!

Currently about halfway through CF´s Digital Marketing course:
+ Positive and encouraging communication from Career Foundry´s student advisors.
+ The tutor and mentor I have been paired up with are really helpful.
+ Great to have call access to a Professional Mentor throughout the course.
+ Most lessons are informative, entertaining with overall good resources.
+ Overall nice curriculum design.
+ Nice to be able to see the course progress, have access to other students´ submissions as well.
Where they can improve:
- The major problem I faced is that some of the lessons explaining Wordpress, Mailchimp, Google Analytics are out of date ( they refer to old versions of these platforms), and as a student this is quite frustrating and confusing and completely defeats the purpose of the learning it through the course.
- Quite a few of the linked resources  (articles, extra readings etc) are outdated / not relevant to the platforms etc and should be updated.
- As someone who gets access to the course through the Arbeitsamt ( German Employment Office) the 6 month post-course completion where CF would assist you with their Job Guarantee unfortunately does not apply. 
Personal Recommendations:
- Could be a nice option to be able to talk to the tutor ( not only the mentor) as they oversee all the main exercises. 
Takeaway:
Overall I´ve had a positive experience so far, have been learning well and would recommend it to potential students.

My experience with CareerFoundry has been excellent so far (about a third into the program). The content is very practical and the curriculum is very well thought out. I really like how they designed the roadmap for my data analytics program. Furthermore, I have an excellent tutor and mentor that I feel are there for me 24/7 and whom I have lots to learn from and have started to develop a good relationship with. I also appreciate that there is always a feedback form at the end of each lesson so I can give suggestions on how it would make my learning better/more efficient. This really shows that CareerFoundry looks after its students first and foremost!

They are professional and the content of the courses is great! I learnt so much with them in a short period of time than trying to study Digital Marketing on my own. Excellent Tutors and Mentors, guiding me on the path of my dream career!

Since joining the school, I have had constant support from my mentor, Luca, and my tutor, Elena. They are constantly working with me; it's like,e 24/7 because if I submit my work on weekends, I get constant replies. I am so happy. I hope I made the best decision to choose my career; I can now start my job because of the knowledge I have gained from them. Everything I needed, I got it. thank you for the knowledge in Tech.

The material is so straight forward. I assumed it would be difficult picking up the jargon but they do a great job of slowly integrating. While like all similar programs where you really get out what you put in, CareerFoundry does their absolute best to make sure you have everything you need. Also, tutors and mentors are very responsive.

I am halfway through my Product Management course and I am very happy with my experience with Career Foundry. The course material is informative, but digestible, and the exercises allow you to put into practice what you've just learned. The CF team has solve all problems that have arisen quickly and everyone has been very helpful. I like that there is always someone who you can talk to and ask questions. I would recommend this course for anyone wanting to gain knowledge and expertise in a new field quickly.
A really good and detailed course. I like the way they teach us and the structure of the whole path. I really learn a lot.
The course is very complete, I really enjoy te experience of completing a task and wait for the feedback, the structure of the course is intuitive and easy to absorb.

If you're new to the world of tech, I would recommend taking a few free online courses first. I'm learning a lot (which is what I wanted) but much of this is on my own...online study buddies can be hard to find, the tutor can take up to 24 hrs to get back to you (so if you have a couple of questions throughout a Task, it can take days to finish a 3 hr assignment) This course is def teaching me to think outside the box for problems, which is good, but some days it feels harder than it should be.

It was pretty challenging to find a course in a digital marketing field, where one can get enough practice and real-life tasks! During the course one gets super professional and helpful instructors, diverse projects and lots, lots of insights that you will never get by self learning. Beautiful portfolio & executive career advisory are the cherry 🍒 on pie. Thank you, Career Foundry! I really enjoyed this time.
Pros
A very comprehensive course, with no unnecessary theory Instructors are working in real industry and are very professional The school is highly appreciated by recruiters And much more...
Cons
Basically nothing. But the course is not for lazy people, as it's pretty challenging
Wonderful support from the career foundry team

The Full Stack Web Development program has a good layout and curriculum - the lessons and reading materials are fairly thorough and touch on many different areas. The best part about the program is the flexibility as I can read and work on tasks at my own pace, so I squeeze in some studying whenever I have some time. The only thing that doesn't quite play out as smoothly is trying to find someone for help when I'm confused about a task or stuck on a project. There's no "immediate" answers and I cannot just "raise my hand" and ask a question, but that is usually the case with online learning. There's a tutor and mentor, but the responses usually take some time, and the responses are sometimes not what I expected or hoped for (not too detailed or doesn't really address my question), and I can't afford more time going back and forth and waiting. I usually end up figuring out things by myself one way or another, but the process can be very frustrating at times.
My mentor and tutor have given me very in depth feedback and answer any questions I have extremely thoroughly and with added resources. They really make the course!
I'm in the middle of the UX Design Immersive program. I love that I can access my tutor and mentor at any time. They are both extremely helpful to have on my team and a wealth of knowledge.

I love both my tutor and my mentor! It's so nice to work with industry professionals every step of the way. The assignments are broken down into easy to digest pieces. However, if you struggle with reading large paragraphs of text, I would recommend to maybe wait or find a better screen reader than the one offered by the course. If you work full time, the course work can be a little heavy, but you receive lots of help along the way. I definitely recommend this course if you're ready and willing to learn something new!

The Experience have been great
at end of each task there is an exercise that must submitted review and approved by the Tutor, also an recap exercise to be review by mentor at end of each Achievement to round up the Achievement before you proceed to the next Achievement.

This company will fool you into thinking that they provide a comprehensive UX Design bootcamp. Their job guarantee scheme is a complete scam. The job search methods they suggest are useless and so unhelpful. I ended up doing most of the work myself outside of the course parameters. It was such a waste of money, I honestly wish I went with any other company.

I started the Data Analytics boot camp course at the end of October. I was having some trouble through the holidays and part of that was my mentor. I put in a request for a new mentor and since then she has helped me greatly and getting a new one was no hastle.

I think the course is great and although I would’ve preferred to be connected with my career advisor earlier on in my journey I am enjoying the content and am learning a lot. I also find sessions with my mentor informative and insightful.

One of the best decisions I ever made was to join the Data Analytics program at CareerFoundry. The course content itself is top-notch, and then there are the partial scholarships, technical support from the excellent mentors and tutors, emotional support from the student support group, a large online student community to share ideas with... and to top it all off, a job guarantee at the end of the enjoyable journey.

The material is very easy to follow and understand, with straightforward steps when it comes to the tasks. Both the mentor and the tutor are super helpful and responsive. The resources given are great, although there have been a few occasions where the link is outdated and no longer works, but other than that it has been great.

Incredibly misleading with their “satisfaction guarantee” they write it in very fine print so you don’t get your money back but only give you 30 days to request it. Distrustful company and does not guarantee a job at all. Predatory in its advertising. Will not help you if you don’t get a job

It can be daunting to find a bootcamp that would be truly nurturing and caring for your success.  CareerFoundry has been attentive to all my needs to be able to enroll (and assisting me to get a Bildungs Gutschein without much hassle) and to carry on with the learning process.  The tutor, mentor, and student advisors have been fantastic in letting me know that they care about my success.
This program is amazing and truly helpful. It is making my career change process a lot easier and making me more confident as well!

I don't have anything good to say about CareerFoundry's Web Development program. The Tutors are meant for day to day questions, and you can have as frequent as once a week meetings with your Mentor. CareerFoundry gets you by making the crash course super easy, and the first few lessons (after you've paid) start out easy to understand and gradually get way more complicated by the 5th lesson which is after their 14 day refund window.
When I asked the Tutor for any help I needed, they would just end up repeating the homework instructions and took hours to respond. The Mentor was the only one who actually helped me when I had questions but because I could only meet with them and hour a week I could only really get though one assignment a week. 
I even paid for two "extensions" to give myself more time with the Tutors and Mentor. Eventually with all the time waiting for responses and time spent banging my head against a wall, I tried to talk to the advisors and they refused a refund except for the two extensions, even though I didn't even have access to the more expansive portion of the course. That's $7500 down the drain.
Well structured program with expert guidance on in demand skills for beginning software developers. Very flexible.

CareerFoundry has made a huge impact on my life as I enter the uncertain waters of changing my career. The course is very accessible and there's so much concrete and moral support to keep you going. Life changer!

I started with the course in September and I must say everything that I'm learning is all really important content. 
I heard about different platforms that provide this kind of courses and I have to admit I was not that confident of receiving proper assistance and help. But I'm really happy of my choice. My tutor is always available, really helpful, really kind and always provides insights and useful suggestions not only for the specific task but also for the future. 
The mentor's role is also useful for job preparation.
And the student advisor not only assist you withing the indicated time but also keep providing updates and news.
